import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { MailOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import _ from 'lodash'; export default function Footer(props) { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const { heThongRapChieu } = useSelector(state => state.QuanLyRapReducer); const arrHeThongRap = _.map(heThongRapChieu, (heThongRap) => _.pick(heThongRap, [ 'maHeThongRap', 'tenHeThongRap', 'logo' ])); return (
